name: Ultimate Jewels Deluxe
description:
Ultimate Jewels Deluxe is the fastest, most explosive jewel-matching game you’ll ever play! Line up 3 or more jewels to knock them off the board and score; make longer matches to power up jewels with lots of special abilities. This is an addictive match-3-puzzle-game.
Features:
- 300 Levels
-HD Graphics
-Modes: CLASSIC + ARCADE
